name: sushi-rag-app
description: Sushi RAG app - Food ordering web app with AI-powered menu using RAG

scripts.prestart: npm run kill:ports && npm run check:docker-daemon && npm run docker:up && npm run check:docker && npm run db:setup
scripts.dev: npm run prestart && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "npm run open:browser"
scripts.server: npm run prestart && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.client: npm run prestart && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: npm run check:docker && cd backend && npm run db:setup
